name: Next.js RSC Cache Tags 最小
description: fetch の next: { tags } を使う

files.template:
async function getData(){ const r = await fetch('https://example.com', { next: { tags:['list'] } }); return r.text(); }
export default async function Page(){ const html = await getData(); return <div dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: html }} /> }
